title: Business Analyst
description: We are looking for a skilled Business Analyst to join our team.
In this role, you will be responsible for gathering business requirements,
analyzing data, and working closely with stakeholders to improve processes.
You will collaborate with development teams to ensure that business needs
are effectively translated into functional solutions.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in Business Analysis
Proficiency in SQL and data analysis
Experience with Agile methodologies
responsibilities: Gather business requirements
Work with stakeholders to improve processes
Collaborate with development teams
application_instructions: Send an email to the contact email below with subject 'Application for Position Business Analyst'

title: Software Developer
description: We are seeking an experienced Software Developer to work on cutting-edge projects.
You will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications,
optimizing code for performance and scalability, and collaborating with cross-functional teams.
The ideal candidate should have a strong background in Python and JavaScript,
as well as experience with cloud platforms like AWS or Azure.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in software development
Strong knowledge of Python and JavaScript
Experience with cloud platforms like AWS or Azure
responsibilities: Develop and maintain web applications
Optimize code for performance and scalability
Work with cross-functional teams
application_instructions: Send an email to the contact email below with subject 'Application for Position Software Developer'

title: Cloud Engineer
description: We are hiring a Cloud Engineer to optimize and manage our cloud infrastructure.
The ideal candidate will have experience with AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud,
and will be responsible for designing, deploying, and maintaining scalable solutions.
You will work closely with development teams to ensure efficient and secure cloud operations.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in cloud engineering
Expertise in AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud
Experience with Kubernetes and Docker
Familiarity with infrastructure as code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
responsibilities: Design and implement cloud-based solutions
Optimize cloud resources for performance and cost
Ensure security best practices in cloud environments
application_instructions: Send an email to the contact email below with subject 'Application for Position Cloud Engineer'

title: Data Scientist
description: Tansa Tech is seeking a Data Scientist to extract insights from large datasets.
In this role, you will develop machine learning models, build predictive analytics,
and work with business teams to improve decision-making processes.
A strong background in Python, SQL, and data visualization is required.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in data science
Strong knowledge of Python, SQL, and data visualization tools
Experience with machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch
Ability to work with large datasets and optimize models for performance
responsibilities: Develop and deploy machine learning models
Analyze data to extract insights and inform business strategies
Collaborate with engineers and analysts on data-driven projects
application_instructions: Send an email to the contact email below with subject 'Application for Position Data Scientist'

title: Software Engineer – AI Integration
description: Work on integrating AI pipelines with backend platforms for the energy sector.
Collaborate with data scientists and DevOps engineers to streamline deployment of intelligent systems.
Ensure scalable and reliable AI services in production environments.
requirements: 4+ years of backend development experience
Experience integrating AI/ML systems into production
Strong programming skills in Python and/or Go
responsibilities: Integrate AI models with backend systems
Collaborate across data and engineering teams
Optimize performance and reliability of AI services
application_instructions: Send an email to the contact email below with subject 'Application for Position Software Engineer – AI Integration'

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Build CI/CD pipelines, secure cloud deployments, and automate infrastructure.
Work closely with development teams to support efficient delivery pipelines and platform reliability.
requirements: 3+ years of DevOps or SRE experience
Proficiency in CI/CD tooling and infrastructure automation
Experience with cloud environments (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
responsibilities: Design and implement CI/CD pipelines
Automate cloud infrastructure and deployments
Monitor and improve system reliability
application_instructions: Send an email to the contact email below with subject 'Application for Position DevOps Engineer'

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Research and implement predictive models for power systems and failure analysis.
Develop scalable machine learning pipelines for real-time and batch inference.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in machine learning
Strong background in predictive modeling and feature engineering
Experience with ML frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch
responsibilities: Design and train machine learning models
Build and maintain ML pipelines
Collaborate with domain experts in the energy sector
application_instructions: Send an email to the contact email below with subject 'Application for Position Machine Learning Engineer'

title: Frontend Engineer (React)
description: Build interactive dashboards and visualizations for energy clients.
Work closely with designers and backend developers to deliver responsive, data-driven UIs.
requirements: 3+ years of frontend development experience
Strong proficiency in React and modern JavaScript
Experience with data visualization libraries (e.g., D3.js, Chart.js)
responsibilities: Develop and maintain UI components using React
Implement rich, interactive dashboards
Ensure responsiveness and performance across devices
application_instructions: Send an email to the contact email below with subject 'Application for Position Frontend Engineer (React)'
